p: AhR signaling is dependent of the formation of complexes with other proteins (cross-talk), such as AhR-interacting protein (AIP), estrogen receptor (ER), inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS), matrix metalloproteinase (MMP), nuclear factor-κB (NF-κB), prostaglandin synthase (PGHS), retinoblastoma protein (RB), tumor necrosis factor α (TNF-α) and xenobiotic-metabolizing enzymes (XME) ( Beischlag et al., 2008).
